remarks: The quotient of two finite products.  A version of ~ fproddiv using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fproddivf.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fproddivf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fproddivf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fproddivf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fproddivf.ne0 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C =/= 0 ) $.
fproddivf $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A ( B / C ) = ( prod_ k e. A B / prod_ k e. A C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
